metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11439 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
The TagLib::Ogg::FLAC::File::scan function in oggflacfile.cpp in TagLib 1.11.1 allows remote attackers to cause information disclosure (heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted audio file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-11439` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtag1v5 - 1.11.1+dfsg.1-0.3
libtag1v5-vanilla - 1.11.1+dfsg.1-0.3
libtagc0 - 1.11.1+dfsg.1-0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: taglib package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.11.1+dfsg.1-0.3').
